AttributeUpdates.description: List of attributes that need to be updated in a given schema Facet. Each attribute is followed by AttributeAction, which specifies the type of update operation to perform.

ObjectType.description: The object type that is associated with the facet. See CreateFacetRequest$ObjectType for more details.

SchemaArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that is associated with the Facet. For more information, see arns.
